greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A324213(A228058(n)).
comment: If a(n) > 2 for all n, then there are no odd perfect numbers. See also the conjectures in A324213.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..25000
program: A228058list(up_to) = { my(v=vector(up_to), k=0, n=0); while(k<up_to, n++; if(isA228058(n), k++; v[k] = n)); (v); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 29 2019
